tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    preferences JSON
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    preference VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
    target_customer VARCHAR(100),
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
first_name STRING,
last_name STRING,
age INT,
email STRING,
phone_number STRING,
address STRING,
postal_code STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Demographics (customer_id INT,
age_group STRING,
gender STRING,
income FLOAT,
marital_status STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Preferences (customer_id INT,
favorite_brand STRING,
favorite_product STRING,
discount_code STRING
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerPreferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    preference_type VARCHAR,
    preference_value VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerDemographics(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingSegments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR,
    target_age_group VARCHAR,
    target_gender VARCHAR,
    target_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE SegmentCustomerMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerDemographics(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES MarketingSegments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (

customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
age INT,
gender VARCHAR(10),
email TEXT,
address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (

demographic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id UUID,
region VARCHAR(50),
income DECIMAL,
ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
education VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (

preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id UUID,
favorite_color VARCHAR(20),
preferred_brand VARCHAR(50),
subscription_status BOOLEAN,
last_purchase_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_strategies (

strategy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
segment_name VARCHAR(50),
target_region VARCHAR(50),
target_age_group VARCHAR(20),
target_gender VARCHAR(10),
target_interests TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sales_history (

sale_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id UUID,
sale_date TIMESTAMP,
product_name VARCHAR(50),
sale_amount DECIMAL,
is_returned BOOLEAN
);
